Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 25th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1973...
Injured on 4/23/1975 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 7/21/1979 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/23/1979 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 7/21/1981, off Scott McGregor (ATL)...
Hit for the cycle against Pittsburgh on 8/25/1982...
Injured on 9/1/1982 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1984...
Traded from Philadelphia to Cleveland on 5/12/1986 (Going to PHI: P R. Botting. Going to CLE: P M. Jeffcoat, CF G. Roenicke)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Detroit on 7/18/1988...
